website_summaries.verdict: If you're a Dropbox user with an Android device, Dropbox is a must-have app. It gives you access to your files from anywhere, and it can automatically back up your photos and videos, too.
pros: Automatic photo and video upload option
Can create text files inside app
cons: Can't view files by type, except for images

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Good for what I need!! But expensive!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Easy means of transferring pics/docs etc
customer_reviews.text: Dropbox is the simplest means of storing pics/docs etc. And a secure way to allow others access any authorised data.
customer_reviews.author: Jaguar S

customer_reviews.title: Well done Dropbox.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as you'd expect, across all platforms i've got it in. Great UI, perfectly optimised and responsive as usual
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have used dropbox (free version ) for years on my laptop. Now put it on my new kindle fire. Does everything you expect of it.
customer_reviews.author: bob smith

customer_reviews.title: How to stop error stream message
customer_reviews.text: Can transfer ePub books from adobe digital editions to Dropbox app and they appear in the app on my kindle fire hd 8 but get error stream message downloading them to bluefire reader on my kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be useful for file transfers in the future
customer_reviews.text: Installed on the Kindle OK. Could be useful for file transfers in the future.

customer_reviews.title: top marks
customer_reviews.text: what can I say but I find it a bit hard to use

customer_reviews.title: Installed normally but once I would download a file a ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed normally but once I would download a file a black screen would appear for a split second then go back to the dropbox page
customer_reviews.author: Raja Adeeb Hussain

customer_reviews.title: how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: I have only just started using this app it would be better to alow people 6 months before asking questions but so far I have found it helpful
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could do with a slideshow feature ........always room for improvemet
customer_reviews.author: Alun ingram

customer_reviews.title: 2Gb of storage with free version, or £7: ...
customer_reviews.text: 2Gb of storage with free version, or £7:99 per month for extra storage, Will delete it from my tablet .
customer_reviews.author: Sommeguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fab example of an App App, using it all the time for music sharing.
customer_reviews.author: cruzar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for sharing documents! Couldn't share my large documents without it. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Helga Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good app and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good app especially when transferring photos Or files from phone to phone saves downloading to computer first would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Sharing with family
customer_reviews.text: Ease of sending, receiving files of photos in one go
customer_reviews.author: Jillian M Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Always liked Dropbox, so having it on my Kindle was a sensible evolution.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally available from Amazon for Kindles!
customer_reviews.text: And about time! Been waiting ages to get Dropbox on my kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Treefrog

customer_reviews.text: Used for storage of important files. Simple logical operation, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John M. Wellock

customer_reviews.title: issues
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use it as a carrier of showreel clips, whereby other users could play my videos once I'd sent them the link. Most had to download first, rather than just play, and some vids seem to lose their audio although it was there at my end. Google Drive works better, I'm afraid, and you get more free space too.
customer_reviews.author: John Gow

customer_reviews.title: Dropbox
customer_reviews.text: It's just right for your pictures. If your phone breaks and you have got Dropbox you can get them all back
customer_reviews.author: martin kenyon

customer_reviews.title: struggling
customer_reviews.text: I still cannot get my pictures from my phone on to kindle through dropbox. They are appearing on computer but not my Kindle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it should
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should do, allowing me to access my files anywhere I'm connected to Wifi
customer_reviews.author: Hannabannanah

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: A reliable tool that I have added to my Fire so that I have access from all of my devices

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to upload to. Lost my uploads that I managed to put on there.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use it mainly for downloadable Crochet patterns (pdf’s) and it keeps them quick and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: unkown

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant prog
customer_reviews.text: I Love this!! It allows me to access my files wherever I am. One hint, on android, to see your files when not on line, long press the file and make it a favourite. It will be available whether on line or not.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is so brilliant to me I can save my pics and free up my phone storage so easily

customer_reviews.title: Poor app store support
customer_reviews.text: The ability to save back into Dropbox from other apps is limited due to poor Amazon App Store

customer_reviews.title: Dropbox app
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, does what it supposed to do wold recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Large selection well priced and good delivery All around good service, will certainly use again

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for storing photos but my dropbox is full, even though I have deleted some. Why is this?

customer_reviews.title: great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says on the BOX always at hand helped me out loads of times and it saves carrying loads of unwanted stuff just connect and click what you want

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic need it to survive because everything is accessible on any platform!!

customer_reviews.title: What can I say !
customer_reviews.text: It works well for my photos, which is what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am Happy with the result. I already have it on my laptop
customer_reviews.author: George Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: It automatically backs up and keeps all my pictures and has saved me a lot of lost memories from devices breaking. Its also great to be able to scroll through photos on all my devices without messing around moving my stuff from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: LiamTaylor93

customer_reviews.title: has possabilities for the future
customer_reviews.text: There was not enough space to add another device i.e. tablet and copy my photos. in saying that the initial upload was fine
customer_reviews.author: Georgey1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Been using Dropbox for around 8 or more years. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Mullane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Drop your files in the box... done! Works as it should - it's all in the name.
customer_reviews.author: conor fleck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget but it was a pain to set up.
customer_reviews.author: E Page

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is good for storing/transferring pics etc but is quite expensive to buy more space.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tells me it is full and it going to cost 70 pounds plus to continue. Can't contemplate i
customer_reviews.author: Busby

customer_reviews.title: its great it give me play store on my gemini tablet
customer_reviews.text: its great it helps people who need help with bits for tablets comp phone I will tell all my friends about it thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: mrs patbunsell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but wish there was a Kindle version
customer_reviews.text: Dropbox is fast and easy to use, I have it as an app and on my PC. I'm disappointed that there isn't a Kindle version so that's why it's lost 1 star. I would recommend this app for storing, sharing and transferring files.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Required usage for everybody.
customer_reviews.text: I can't get by without Dropbox. Their free storage is irritatingly low, though you can increase it through various tips and tricks. But it is so useful for sharing things with other people, for cloud backup of important docs, and for automated tranfer of photos from mobiles etc. - recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Paulley

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for miltiple platforms
customer_reviews.text: If you have lots of different devices, with different OS on them this is the way to share files. To my knowledge it works on Linux, Windows, IOS and Android. You get 2 gig free and can therefore use it to secure files and make them available anywhere to any of your devices. It is a default app for me. Simple to use, it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Rave Review

customer_reviews.title: A very useful tool
customer_reviews.text: I had not come across Dropbox until my 83 year old mother told me a friend had installed it on her laptop. I am completely won over. It's a perfect way to keep photos on a tablet without having to download them into the limited memory - provided you have a wifi connection. For keen photographers, and not so keen, it's an ideal storage solution.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Hoad

customer_reviews.title: Dropbox is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Keep pictures home videos even movies on mine. I highly recommend it to anyone that has android tablet or phone
customer_reviews.author: Tashia Colluney

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable cloud backup now with native Kindle support
customer_reviews.text: The Kindle specific version of Dropbox seems to have taken an age to appear but here it is. Indispensable even you have unlimited FTP space on your web server because it's just so easy to use. I keep all my important docs in the Livesync folder which is a zero maintenance way to access them across all platforms.
customer_reviews.author: YellowTone

customer_reviews.title: Good, free storage for exchanging too large files for email
customer_reviews.text: I often send large ebook files but some are too big by email, same with photos or videos. So Dropbox is good for me to upload to there, share with recipient and send them a link to login to it and download it. Also used it to temporarily store some legal (house purchase) documents for my friend who accidentally deleted the emails they were attached too (she didn't realise that would delete the documents too). So, until the house purchase was completed, I recovered them for her and put them on Dropbox (and other cloud places) just in case she accidentally deleted the emails again. So it's good as a temporary back up too.
customer_reviews.author: celinego

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should, keeping files for me. Easy to use. All tickety-boo!
customer_reviews.author: florid065

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for all my photos, accessible from tablet, phone or computer and always safe.
customer_reviews.author: P G tips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to move pictures And data for one device to another ,
customer_reviews.author: steven easy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for storing things as well as on your laptop
customer_reviews.author: sandie b

customer_reviews.title: No good if you want to be able to edit.
customer_reviews.text: Can't edit anything on Kindle version. Only good for reading saved documents.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Boon

customer_reviews.title: Great way to send photos etc
customer_reviews.text: All the family use it to share photos, journals, coursework for University and College. It is the best and easiest way to share with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M M Fitzsimons

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Have my files easily accessible on iPhone and Kindle. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P Peverell

customer_reviews.title: Dropbox or the Amazon Fire tablet at last!
customer_reviews.text: Finally Dropbox has appeared on Fire tablets! My Fire is now able to be used for work as well as play! Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: McMackem

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives me the option of having my photos on a mobile device. Very good
customer_reviews.author: goldie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good. But all my devices do not always sync.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t make it easy to get started, now they want money off me to upgrade because I have too many tablets , although I only use the newest ones! Will not use them again.
customer_reviews.author: wallyron

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This app worked perfectly for me, I have it installed on my laptop, mobile and kindle fire, and have no problems on any platform.
customer_reviews.author: Tubatu

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable back up
customer_reviews.text: A great way to back up documents and to put on photographs for sharing and safe storage.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good app, well worth having
customer_reviews.text: A necessary app for anyone wanting to use Dropbox on their Kindle Fire. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: P.Hall

customer_reviews.title: Kinda essential app
customer_reviews.text: great app. take a photo its on my computer. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: What's the point?
customer_reviews.text: I login with Google and can't do it on the kindle version. Makes it frustrating and pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Hooman Naini

customer_reviews.title: Great app, of course
customer_reviews.text: I love the dropbox service, have used it for years. Used this particular app to transfer some files to a Kindle Fire - a mission that wasn't particularly successful and only served as a reminder of my dislike for Android and all of its many manufacturer iterations. Thankfully the tablet broke and went back, but if you do have a working device that hasn't driven you to insanity this is a great app and well worth downloading.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and a great back up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Been an absolute saviour. I had to change phones and had a lot of photos I didn't want to lose. All I had to do was share them to the dropbox and they can now be accessed from phone or Kindle. Also other family members have emailed me links to save their photos. Just create files and put them in. Safely saved. Can save documents too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs DLH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad this has now been made available via Amazon App store.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Sophie M Moss

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Intuitive App
customer_reviews.text: Easy and intuitive app just wish it had more free storage. However the app has a nice layout and look.
customer_reviews.author: Jelectronic

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: Access to all the files on my Linux desktop - Windows laptop and now my Amazon Fire
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use Dropox all the time and the app works well 😆
customer_reviews.author: R. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: good game for all the family
customer_reviews.text: Fab game to play together as a family, ideal fun for forthcoming beach amusement. Suitable for all age groups FAB
customer_reviews.author: chaz

customer_reviews.title: A big switch-room for PIMS Coordination
customer_reviews.text: Dropbox is a big focus centre and switch-room for Personal Information Management Systems coordination. The new DropBox app for desktops is awesome in functionality and convenience. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kaliunis Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable
customer_reviews.text: This app has saved my backside on several occasions. It's a safe haven for all my snaps and business documents, as well as offering a superb facility for sharing with colleagues and family. Good work you developers. It could on the rest from a great height.
customer_reviews.author: Lidl Fury

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I once lost 3 years of tax accounts on an external hard drive. Now everything is backed up to Dropbox. Which I can access on any phone,tablet or computer
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Useful but difficult
customer_reviews.text: Dropbox is very useful but I personally find it difficult to work with - perhaps I’m not ‘getting’ the instructions, but for me it’s not very intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: Device limitations etc now make this once essential app rather pointless. Don't think that paying for additional features is going to help, a quick search will show that many people are having billing problems.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Dropbox app.
customer_reviews.text: Love this app. If you need to transfer file or photos between device thus us the app. you need. You can use your files when offline as long as you make your preference look for the vertical three dots on the right hand side of your file once uploaded.
customer_reviews.author: Oracle

customer_reviews.title: ... it to see photo's on my computer and phone easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am able to use it to see photo's on my computer and phone easy to use also
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Collaboration Tool
customer_reviews.text: A rugged method of cloud storage, it is excellent for sharing files and collaborating with collegues. Having it available on my new Amazon Fire tablet allows for easier portability too. Using it on a smartphone was okay, but the small screen made some documents difficult to view.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. J. West

customer_reviews.title: Nighmare
customer_reviews.text: This has been a nightmare for me as every time something is saved in it, it won't let me delete. It says I'm not the owner of the things that are saved, ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: IAN H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great app easy to use and puts your photos in sequential order
customer_reviews.author: Brian Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Dropbox
customer_reviews.text: It a good app to use to send a link to see large video and lots of photos, when you have no other app to send or receive large files etc
customer_reviews.author: Raymie P

customer_reviews.title: voice recordings and other files to share so easy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for a few years now, photos, sheet music, voice recordings and other files to share so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Geraghty

customer_reviews.title: Really well designed and thought out App
customer_reviews.text: This app is really to use and better than the online version in my opinion. Does everything I need
customer_reviews.author: Ed Reed

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: Ever so easy to use, store and download and review what is saved. Had it for years no problem. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Pike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have Dropbox on all my gadgets for years and I am truly impressed with it
customer_reviews.author: gemmyjan

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this app on all my devices. Really useful for sharing small and large files with my other devices and friends.
customer_reviews.author: AudioNerd

customer_reviews.title: Dropbox kindle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, I have app on my phone and tablet, also on my computer. Great to be able to view on all devices
customer_reviews.author: Miss J R Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great App
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and install. I have it on all my computers plus my mobile. Able to send photos and documents to all these devices. Great app
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walton

customer_reviews.title: has its uses
customer_reviews.text: It has been very good except you have to pay to use it on more than 3 devices. So lacks flexibility
customer_reviews.author: Andy P

customer_reviews.title: Fine.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got time to write anything more, other than, exactly as description.
customer_reviews.author: MAW

customer_reviews.title: The best file sharing program out there, nothing else needed.
customer_reviews.text: The best file sharing program out there, nothing else needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product!
customer_reviews.text: After having had Dropbox on my laptop ad iPhone, I thought it would be convenient to have it on my Fire HD tablet as well. The installation was easy and it works as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Ingeborg C Daoud

customer_reviews.title: Dropbox Kindle
customer_reviews.text: I actually wish to delete the dropbox from my Kindle but need assistance as to how to do this. I do not want to use the dropbox. Can anyone help me please.

customer_reviews.title: great cloud drive
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use & can be accessed from anywhere & secured by password
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: Great for small domestic document storage
customer_reviews.text: I think its going to answer all my problems of keeping various insurance documents etc. Safely with good access

customer_reviews.title: couldn't get on to it without purchasing
customer_reviews.text: couldn't even get on to download the pictures I had been sent.
